01fe000053831000 0000ff 0050000000 red
01fe000053831000 a500ff 0050000000 orange
01fe000053831000 ff00ff 0050000000 yellow
01fe000053831000 00ffff 0050000000 purple / pink

                 G B R
01fe000053831000 ff0000 0050000000 green
01fe000053831000 ffff00 0050000000 cyan
01fe000053831000 00ff00 0050000000 blue

01fe0000538310000000000050  ff  0000 ON
01fe0000538310000000000050  00  0000 OFF





{:ok, s} = BSRBulb.Client.start("/dev/tty.1byoneBulb-SerialPortSe")
BSRBulb.Client.set_color(s, "#ff1223")
